Html:
Hi

I can't make the formula SUM(CELL;CELL) work. If I set the setPreCalculateFormulas to false then excel tells me there is an error in the file and after he fixed it the value is 0.

If the setPreCalculateFormulas is set to false then the browser tells me he can't find the files.

In the mean time I use =CELL+CELL+CELL+CELL wich works good.

Formula must be written like in English version of Excel using comma to separate function arguments.

Check this post:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=32906

Okay I see.

It works now :).

Thx
